params.account: The account being operated on behalf of.
params.permissionId: The permission ID to check for.
params.projectId: The project ID that the operator has permission to operate under. 0 represents all projects.

returns._0: A flag indicating whether the operator has the specified permission.

params.account: The account being operated on behalf of.
params.permissionIds: An array of permission IDs to check for.
params.projectId: The project ID that the operator has permission to operate under. 0 represents all projects.

returns._0: A flag indicating whether the operator has all specified permissions.

setPermissionsFor(address,(address,uint2.details: Only an address can give permissions to or revoke permissions from its operators.

params.account: The account setting its operators' permissions.
params.permissionsData: The data which specifies the permissions the operator is being given.

hasPermission(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Check if an operator has a specific permission for a specific address and project ID.

hasPermissions(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Check if an operator has all of the specified permissions for a specific address and project ID.

permissionsOf(address,address,uint256).notice: The permissions that an operator has been given by an account for a specific project.

params.account: The account being operated on behalf of.
params.permissionId: The permission ID to check for.
params.projectId: The project ID that the operator has permission to operate under. 0 represents all projects.

returns._0: A flag indicating whether the operator has the specified permission.

params.account: The account being operated on behalf of.
params.permissionIds: An array of permission IDs to check for.
params.projectId: The project ID that the operator has permission to operate under. 0 represents all projects.

returns._0: A flag indicating whether the operator has all specified permissions.

setPermissionsFor(address,(address,uint2.details: Only an address can give permissions to or revoke permissions from its operators.

params.account: The account setting its operators' permissions.
params.permissionsData: The data which specifies the permissions the operator is being given.

hasPermission(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Check if an operator has a specific permission for a specific address and project ID.

hasPermissions(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Check if an operator has all of the specified permissions for a specific address and project ID.

permissionsOf(address,address,uint256).notice: The permissions that an operator has been given by an account for a specific project.
